class SpaceComponent_C3001
{
    public static void main(String args[])
    {
        java.util.Scanner sc=new java.util.Scanner(System.in);
        String color[]=new String[4];
        int arr[]=new int[4];
        int i=0;
        StringBuilder str=new StringBuilder();
        while(i<4)
        {
            color[i]=sc.next().toLowerCase();
            if(color[i].equals("white"))
            {
                arr[i]=9;
                str.append("1001");
            }
            else if(color[i].equals("black"))
            {
                arr[i]=0;
                str.append("0000");
            }
            if(color[i].equals("brown"))
            {
                arr[i]=1;
                str.append("0001");
            }
            else if(color[i].equals("red"))
            {
                arr[i]=2;
                str.append("0010");
            }
            if(color[i].equals("orange"))
            {
                arr[i]=3;
                str.append("0011");
            }
            else if(color[i].equals("yellow"))
            {
                arr[i] = 4;
                str.append("0100");
            }
            if(color[i].equals("green"))
            {
                arr[i] = 5;
                str.append("0101");
            }
            else if(color[i].equals("blue"))
            {
                arr[i] = 6;
                str.append("0110");
            }
            if(color[i].equals("violet"))
            {
                arr[i] = 7;
                str.append("0111");
            }
            else if(color[i].equals("grey"))
            {
                arr[i] = 8;
                str.append("1000");
            }
            i++;
       }
        long output=Long.parseLong(str.toString(),2)*(long)Math.pow(10,arr[3]);
        System.out.println(output+" Guntur");
    }
}
